This is a little-tested wrapper for "bwidget", a set of widgets for Tk. Please report your experiences, good or bad, on the Tkinter mailing list:
  • tkinter-discuss@python.org
  • http://mail.python.org/mailman/listinfo/tkinter-discuss
A copy of bwidget 1.7.0 is included for your convenience.

To install, use a command like python setup.py install.
